sense.def:
A handle
je del predmeta, za katerega primemo, ko predmet nesemo ali upravljamo.

seg.quote: He tugged at the metal handle.

sense.def:
To fly off the handle
pomeni popolnoma izgubiti oblast nad seboj;

To handle something
pomeni nekaj prijeti in vrteti po rokah.

seg.quote: The child handled the ornaments carefully and seldom broke anything.

sense.def:
To handle something
pomeni nekaj uporabljati ali učinkovito obvladovati, na primer orožje, avtomobil ali konja.

seg.quote: She had handled a machine gun herself.

sense.def:
To handle a problem or a particular area of work
pomeni obravnavati ali biti odgovoren za neki problem ali določeno delovno področje.

seg.quote: You don't have to come. Hendricks and I can handle it.
He handles all the major accounts.
His handling of these important issues was condemned by the opposition.

sense.def:
To handle people
pomeni spretno pripraviti ljudi do tega, da nas spoštujejo in storijo tisto, kar od njih želimo.

seg.quote: The principal was a genius in the way he handled us.
